text: Colphepeira is a genus of North American orb-weaver spiders containing the single species, Colphepeira catawba. It was first described by Allan Frost Archer in 1941, and has only been found in United States and Mexico. ==References== Category:Araneidae Category:Monotypic Araneomorphae genera Category:Spiders of Mexico Category:Spiders of the United States
title: Colphepeira
